newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks lower on meagre volume.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks lower on meagre volume.

text.p: Croatian stocks were down on Friday on extremely low trade.
* Turnover declined to 0.1 million kuna and volume was also lower at 1,886 shares.
* Food processor Podravka lost nine kuna to close at 259, with 146 units traded.
* Hotelier Suncani Hvar fell seven kuna, closing at 57 on volume of 1,740 shares. (5.4112 = $1) -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
